resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157603</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157603</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3147</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Matching Activity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenpassende Aktivität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activité Assortie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividade Combinando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività Di Corrispondenza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταιριάζοντας με δραστηριότητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Actividad Que corresponde con</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These are the teachers guidelines to creating a type of matching activity, where twohalves of a sentence have to be matched.While suitable for any topice the topic of this activity is specifically on History of Isarel</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese sind die Lehrerkorrekturlinien zum Erstellen
eines Typen zusammenpassende Aktivität, in der twohalves eines 
Programmsatzes matched.While sein müssen, die für jedes mögliches 
topice verwendbar sind, welches, das Thema dieser Aktivität 
spezifisch auf Geschichte von Isarel ist</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce sont les directives de professeurs à créer un
type d'activité assortie, où les twohalves d'une phrase doivent 
être matched.While appropriés à n'importe quel topice que le sujet 
de cette activité est spécifiquement sur l'histoire d'Isarel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes são os guidelines dos professores a criar 
um tipo de atividade combinando, onde os twohalves de uma sentença 
têm que ser matched.While apropriados para todo o topice que o 
tópico desta atividade estiver especificamente no history de Isarel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste sono la guida di riferimento degli 
insegnanti a creare un tipo di attività di corrispondenza, dove i 
twohalves di una frase devono essere matched.While adatti a tutto il 
topice ch'il soggetto di questa attività è specificamente su storia 
di Isarel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές είναι οι οδηγίες δασκάλων στη δημιουργία ενός 
τύπου ταιριάσματος της δραστηριότητας, όπου twohalves μιας 
πρότασης πρέπει να αντιστοιχηθεί Ενώ κατάλληλο για 
οποιοδήποτε topice το θέμα αυτής της δραστηριότητας είναι 
συγκεκριμένα στην ιστορία Isarel</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éstas son las guías de consulta de los 
profesores a crear un tipo de actividad que corresponde con, donde los
twohalves de una sentencia tienen que ser matched.While convenientes 
para cualquier topice que el asunto de esta actividad esté 
específicamente en la historia de Isarel</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">linguaggio inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αγγλική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ιστορία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">lenguaje inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">historia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <status>
            <source>statusValues</source>
            <value>final</value>
          </status>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education

org:Israel Ministry of Education

            <date>
              <dateTime>2009-02-20</dateTime>
            </date>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3147</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
version:3.0
fn:Israel Ministry of Education

org:Israel Ministry of Education

            </date>
          </contribute>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>other</value>
          </learningResourceType>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="en">12-16</string>
            <string language="x-t-lre">12-16</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <context>
            <source>LRE.contextValues</source>
            <value>compulsory education</value>
          </context>
          <intendedEndUserRole>
            <source>LRE.intendedEndUserRoleValues</source>
            <value>teacher</value>
          </intendedEndUserRole>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>

            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Rural English Education Department</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>
          <purpose>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>

            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>683</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="en">israel</string>
              </entry>

          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
              <entry>
                <string language="en">history</string>
              </entry>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
